docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryCreated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a gallery is created.

> __Note:__ The event data doesn't include gallery items or their IDs.
> To receive information about the created items you need to listen to the [Gallery Item Created webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/gallery-item-created-webhook) in addition.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryDeleted' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a gallery is deleted.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryItemCreated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a media item is created.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryItemDeleted' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a media item is deleted.

> __Note:__ The event data includes an `originatedFrom` field.
> It indicates whether the webhook was triggered by deleting the entire gallery or a single item.
> Supported Value: `Gallery Deleted`. The field will be empty when triggered by deleting a single item.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryItemUpdated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a media item is updated.

docs.summary: This is summary for 'onGalleryUpdated' is auto generated by metro-service
description: Triggered when a gallery is updated.

> __Note:__ The event data doesn't include gallery items or their IDs.
> To receive information about the updated items you need to listen to the [Gallery Item Updated webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/gallery-item-updated-webhook) in addition.

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: _id
members.doc: WixMedia image ID. Required when associating an existing Wix Media image.

members.name: url
members.doc: Image URL. Required when associating an image from an external database.

members.name: filter
members.doc: documents matching this filter wil be deleted. only filterable documents defined in document_type can be used for filtering

members.name: documentIds
members.doc: ids of the documents to delete

members.name: itemId
members.doc: ID of the media item to delete.

members.name: itemId
members.doc: ID of the deleted media item.

members.name: itemsIds
members.doc: ID of the media item to delete.

members.name: gallery
members.doc: Gallery that previously included the deleted media item.

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: ID of the gallery to delete.

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: url
members.doc: url of the page representing the document

members.name: _id
members.doc: random GUID so clients can tell if event was already handled

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: entityId
members.doc:
Assuming that all messages including Actions have id
Example: The id of the specific order, the id of a specific campaign

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: The time of the event. Useful if there was a delay in dipatching

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dipatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
A field that should be set if this event was triggered by an anonymize request.
For example you must set it to true when sending an event as a result of a GDPR right to be forgotten request.
NOTE: This field is not relevant for `EntityCreatedEvent` but is located here for better ergonomics of consumers.

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Gallery creation date and time in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ` format.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Determines in which order galleries will be displayed in the live site.
If you omit `sortOrder` when creating or updating a gallery, the field will be populated with the current timestamp.
The gallery will then be displayed last.

members.name: totalItems
members.doc: Total number of items in the gallery.

members.name: itemId
members.doc: ID of the deleted media item.

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: id of the gallery that will be published

members.name: itemLimit
members.doc: Maximum number of media items to return. Defaults to 50, minimum 1, maximum 200.

members.name: itemOffset
members.doc: Number of media items to skip in the response. Defaults to 0.

members.name: branchId
members.doc: optional branch id if publish is done from branch

members.name: exif
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs describing the media in [Exchangeable Image File format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exif).

members.name: imageInfo
members.doc: Image info - can include Wix Media or an external link.

members.name: document
members.doc: document with mandatory fields (id, title, description) and with fields specific to the type of the document

members.name: exposure
members.doc:
what type of users should documents be visible to
One of:
GROUP_PROTECTED,
PRIVATE,
PROTECTED,
PUBLIC,
UNCHANGED,
UNKNOWN

members.name: payload
members.doc: data bag with non-searchable fields (url, image)

members.name: permittedMemberGroups
members.doc: what member groups is the document exposed to. Used only with GROUP_PROTECTED exposure

members.name: seoHidden
members.doc: if true SEO is disabled for this document

members.name: reason
members.doc: tell us why you're invalidating the cache. You don't need to add your app name

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Item creation date and time in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ` format.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was last updated in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ` format.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link from the item. You can link to Wix sites or external URLs.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Item sort order.
Determines in which order items will be displayed in the gallery.
If you omit `sortOrder` when creating or updating an item, the field will be populated with the current timestamp.
The item will then be displayed at the end of the gallery.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Item data type.
One of:
IMAGE,
TEXT,
UNDEFINED,
VIDEO

members.name: target
members.doc: Whether the link will be opened in the same tab.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Link type.
One of:
EXTERNAL,
INTERNAL,
UNDEFINED

members.name: itemsId
members.doc: IDs of the media items to retrieve.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The set of field mask paths. **Note:** Currently, only `id` is supported.

members.name: itemLimit
members.doc: Maximum number of media items to return. Defaults to 10, minimum 1, maximum 100.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of galleries to return. Defaults to 10, minimum 1, maximum 100.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of galleries to skip in the response. Defaults to 0.

members.name: totalGalleries
members.doc: Total number of galleries in the site.

members.name: itemLimit
members.doc: Maximum number of media items to return. Defaults to 50, minimum 1, maximum 200.

members.name: itemOffset
members.doc: Number of media items to skip in the response. Defaults to 0.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: id of the gallery that will be published

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: id of the gallery that will be published

members.name: itemId
members.doc: id of the item that will be published

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: id of the gallery that will be published

members.name: itemIds
members.doc: ids of the items that will be published

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: ID of the gallery to publish.

members.name: documentType
members.doc: type of the document the notification is targeted for. Applies to all types if not provided

members.name: indexState
members.doc:
new state of indexing for the site specified in ms_id
One of:
Off,
On,
Unknown

members.name: language
members.doc: languaInternalDocumentUpdateByFilterOperationge the notification is targeted for. Applies to all languages if not provided

members.name: msId
members.doc: site for which notification is targeted

members.name: css
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs describing the [CSS style](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS) of the text.
__Note:__ The object structure is customizable. See the [List Gallery Items](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/list-gallery-items) code example for supported values.

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: Editor font ID of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: editorHtml
members.doc: Editor HTML of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Unsharp masking amount. Controls the sharpening strength. Minimum 0, maximum 5.

members.name: radius
members.doc: Unsharp masking radius in pixels. Controls the sharpening width.

members.name: threshold
members.doc: Unsharp masking threshold. Controls how different neighboring pixels must be for shapening to apply. Minimum 0, maximum 1.

members.name: filter
members.doc: documents matching this filter will be updated

members.name: correlationId
members.doc: id to pass to processing notification

members.name: removeDocumentIds
members.doc: one or more ids of indexed documents to be removed. Removal will happen before addition (if both provided)

members.name: type
members.doc:
One of:
UNDEFINED,
VIMEO,
WIX_MEDIA,
YOUTUBE

members.name: videoInfo
members.doc: Video info - can include Wix Media or an external link.

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.  Required.

members.name: _id
members.doc: WixMedia ID. Required when associating an existing Wix Media video.

members.name: resolutions
members.doc: Available resolutions for the video, starting with the optimal resolution.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL. Required when associating a video from an external database.

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

description: The link object generated by panels in the editor and used by applications in Wix
